Drop-down lists only consider folders from [⇲] Assets Directory\※ Internal\Translation and [⇲] Assets Directory\※ Internal\Themes respectively
E.G.O Gifts Display Info and Icons

It can be used to translate Previews of new Identities/E.G.O by superimposing the exported image onto the official images. However, the program already has a special mode for directly creating higly adjustable Previews in a non-roundabout way, docs link below. Custom Identity/E.G.O Preview creator Documentation.

Anyway, skills localization file counts as skills for viewer only if you write something in coins and they will be visible. Type 0 width to use default value, all text even outside of window still being rendered and scanned. You can use it for all.
P.S. Scale factor also affects on exported images from Custom Identity/E.G.O Preview creator.

If it looks invisible in E.G.O portrait mode, then most likely it is blocked by the 'Right' or 'Left behind E.G.O portrait' Vignette, try to reduce it.
